extendedInfo.description: This is what you need â ultra-secure free cloud storage.We believe that cloud storage should be free, just like email. Current cloud storage vendors, like Dropbox, Google, Box, Microsoft and Apple only offer 5-15GB of free storage, which is not enough for your photos and other media files. Now we offer 100GB-1TB of totally FREE online space to everyone, which is big enough for everything you have stored on your PCs and mobile devices.Free doesn't mean that we donât take responsibility for your files. We know that you care about security and privacy, and that you don't want anyone else being able to read your files. This is why our service is ultra-secure. We are the only company in the market that ensures that only you can access your files. Thanks to our patent protected TruPrivacyâ¢ technology, all files are encrypted and we don't hold the encryption key. Yes, SurDoc is the first company that can provide full feature service, including cross usersâ deduplication, without holding the user's encryption key.We are also very good at document technology. SurDoc provides the best online document viewer. Upload a complex document to both SurDoc and Google Docs, and you will easily be able to see the difference. This is the power of our patent protected VisiDocâ¢ technology.SurDoc works as a huge cloud drive residing in your mobile device or PC. Besides huge free storage, it includes excellent, rich features such as auto-uploading of photos, backing up, accessing, viewing, annotating, signing, and sharing photos, music, movies, documents and more from an unlimited number of devices:Starting with one year of free storage, you can extend this free storage for as many years as you want by saying "I love SurDoc" to your friends every year;Starting with 100GB of free storage, you can earn up to 1TB for free by inviting friends (10GB per referral), as well we will announce several other ways to earn free storage soon;Ultra secure storage - SurDoc is the only cloud storage service provider who cannot read your files;Auto-upload photos, videos, music and more from your mobile device through WiFi;Auto-backup files from all of your devices to your personal cloud;Access, view and edit files in your personal cloud regardless of file format without installing or buying any other software or app;High-fidelity view, best online viewer;Easy file sharing through links, email, Facebook and Twitter;Fill out forms, comment on documents, and add signatures to documents on the go.WHY CHOOSE SURDOC?Largest free space, 100GB-1TB free, big enough for everything;TruPrivacyâ¢ technology ensures that nobody can see your files but you - not our administrator, not a hacker, not the government;VisiDocâ¢ technology handles documents visually, as intuitively as "pen and paper".Great alternative to tiny free space services like Dropbox, Google Drive, iCloud, Box, Carbonite, Crashplan, SOS Online Backup, Mozy, DocuSign, RightSignature, etc.Tip: Download the SurDoc PC client from www.surdoc.com so that you can automatically backup your PC files to your super cool personal cloud storage.

reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to access
reviews.comment: The storage space is great and the best part is it\'s free for a year.
reviews.author: Steve Tripoli

reviews.title: A mere doubt developer...
reviews.comment: What happens after one year... Do i lose all my data stored on cloud? how do i prevent that from happening?
reviews.author: Derrick D\'souza

reviews.title: 100 free gb
reviews.comment: Wow this is great i can finally back up all my music in one place instead of having multiple account on one website
reviews.author: Mario Meza

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: My phone has a small memory card space and I was able to download that I couldent without this app :)
reviews.author: Samuel Escobia

reviews.comment: Good app, wish it will let you see the files as thumbnail
reviews.author: armando murillo

reviews.title: O.m.g. finally.one worth rating.
reviews.comment: A gold award to this app..no piddling bits of data.a staggering..100gb.  Peace of mind storage. Well done.
reviews.author: Ron Leek

reviews.comment: It should have option to play uploaded music files or video files even when offline...\tIt should have option to play uploaded music files or video files even when offline...
reviews.author: Sumit Shinde

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It\'s like you set it and forget it. Does it all on it\'s own. Highly recommend.
reviews.author: Mcvaughn Ovid

reviews.title: One BIG PROBLEM
reviews.comment: Problem when screen turns off all my uploading progress gets canceled no working in background.
reviews.author: Allan Wake

reviews.title: Files
reviews.comment: Wondering why I can\'t move files to specific folders like other storage apps I\'ve used like Dropbox & Drive... Can you help me solve this problem...
reviews.author: Bklyn Barks

reviews.title: Very good bt not awesome
reviews.comment: Pls make some data free forever otherwise users only use ur site for one year If you provide 100gb per year Then pls provide 1-10gb free forever as per your requirement All the best...:)
reviews.author: akshat sinha

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: If it really does have 100 gb feee, they truely deserve all the stars i can give!;-) keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Mark W

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: The uploading speed is very slow. And that\'s not because of my wi-fi speed. My Internet is really fast and this\'s not the first time I upload. Other than that it\'s really good and will be the best cloud storage app ever if only they make uploading as smooth as Dropbox
reviews.author: Adnaan Baraky

reviews.comment: Exellent and unmatched freebies for sizeable storage wannabees. Include download and upload including manipulations inside the cloud would justify 5-star rating. But  overall this is very good.\tProbably, the developer just needs time to fix the observation. And finally, additional speed for both up and download should be increased.
reviews.author: James Reyes

reviews.title: Could been amazing (willing to eventually change rating)
reviews.comment: Clearly we thought up.. but as long you can\'t back up whole folders or back up multiple storage locations it\'s useless. Wanted all of my SD card and flash memory backup. 100gb free, it shouldn\'t be a problem, I have no idea why it had \"camera photos\" as with do much storage selecting folders by hand means I can ensure the right folder location is selected and additional photo folders are missed. I am surely not going in every folder and back up everything out of it\'s original folders would be a mess and a waste of time. Also a auto it manual backup option will go a long way, I am very precious with my phone and tablet batteries. Also don\'t want several \"mobile devices\" to be put together and be nice pick my own online backup folders (folder back up, select what to be auto backup instead of only camera photos, own free range where auto backup goes which will fix the concern of mobile devices mixing - regular backups mean not bombarded with huge data slowing server all at once) not even worried about the lack of tablet UI, as long it functions to the users needs, also wouldn\'t mind ads if it keeps it free.. other than that, it\'s free (but useless to quickly backup) and looks clean.
reviews.author: Anthony Slocombe
